::Brings out a flame thrower:: Well then... apparently the sun and the other 
planets revolve around the Earth then right? I mean god did supposebly create 
us all in his image so that must mean everything revolves around us. Dewboy, 
keep your fanatical thoughts about religion to yourself please, I don't want 
to have to go into some huge flame war over religion, as it would send a 
massive mail spike. Now then if you're going to reply to this send it ONLY to 
LegendaryNemasis@.... That way we can keep this in a private thing so not 
everyone gets a mail spike.

In a message dated 9/9/02 7:10:07 AM Eastern Daylight Time, 
dewboy30816@... writes:


> God is infinite, meaning he can do infinite things at
> one time.  He has to keep all the fusion going in
> stars, and gravity has to stay just the same so we
> don't get pulled into the sun or hurled away from it. 
> So protecting me from witchcraft isn't that much
> trouble for him.
> 
> 



--part1_5b.2db048a6.2aae42aa_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
